name: Confocal-studio
tagline: A flexible software suite for confocal imaging
body:
### Welcome to the Confocal Studio Project.

Confocal Studio is an open source project, designed to enable recording confocal images with any type of hardware.

Confocal Studio was developed in C# .NET 4.5/Prism using VS 2013.

Check back soon for more updates!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
